name: Large Merchandise Distribution & Logistics - Service Transformation
description: Implementation of a comprehensive service management system to streamline post-sales service operations, enhance customer support, and optimize service management for products through Salesforce Sales and Service Clouds.
challenge: The merchandise distribution company faced significant service challenges: inefficient case resolution with manual tracking and lack of automation leading to delayed case resolutions and affected customer satisfaction, high service costs where without predictive maintenance issues were often resolved reactively increasing operational costs, and poor customer engagement due to lack of omnichannel support making it difficult to provide seamless and integrated service experience for customers.
solution: Implemented comprehensive Salesforce Sales and Service Clouds solution featuring automated case tracking and resolution workflows, AI-driven predictive maintenance capabilities for proactive issue resolution, omnichannel support platform for seamless customer experience across all touchpoints, automated service management processes to optimize post-sales operations, and integrated customer support system for enhanced service delivery.
outcomes: 40% faster case resolution with automated tracking and workflows
35% increase in customer satisfaction through seamless omnichannel support
30% reduction in service costs with AI-driven predictive maintenance and proactive issue resolution
Enhanced operational efficiency through automated service management processes
Improved customer experience through integrated omnichannel support platform
Proactive issue prevention reducing reactive maintenance costs and downtime
businessValue: Significant improvement in operational efficiency with 40% faster case resolution
Enhanced customer satisfaction with 35% increase through better service delivery
Substantial cost savings with 30% reduction in service costs through predictive maintenance
Improved service quality through omnichannel support and automated processes
Better resource utilization through proactive maintenance and automated workflows
teamSize: Salesforce Sales and Service Cloud implementation team
